item.name: https://mtdev.movietradeapp.com/auth/generateOtp?mobileNo=9581912301
https://mtdev.movietradeapp.com/auth/validateOtp
Fetches the list of cities where app is available

request.description: - returns the list of cities where app is available

response.name: Fetches the list of cities where app is available

item.name: Fetch deal dates based on movie

request.description:
- Provides the list of dates where deals exists for a paritcular movie in ascending order
    
- Request Parameter: movieid (int)
    
- If no deals exists for a particular movie, it returns empty list. else provides the list of dates

response.name: Fetch deal dates based on movie

item.name: Fetches deals based on movie, date and city

request.description:
- Provides the list of deals on the provided date for a movie in a specific city grouped by theatre
    
- Mandatory request Parameters - city_id, date, movieid and pagination size(number of elements in a single page).
    
- optional request parameters - page. Default value is 0. If no value is provided based on the size, elements of page 0 are returned. Otherwise returns the list of elements to be displayed based on page number and size
    
- returns empty list if there are no deals available based on the given parameters
    
- If deals are available, returns list of deals based on the given parameters

response.name: Fetches deals based on movie, date and city

item.name: fetches count of deals per movie based on city, language,name

request.description:
- Fetches the number of deals available for each movie based on city, language and name.
    
- mandatory parameters - city_id, size.
    
- Optional parameters - name - full movie name or part of a movie name, language - language of movies
    
- Returns empty list if there are no deals based on the provided parameters
    
- Returns number of deals per movie in a given city, language and name of the movie
    
- returns the output based on the pagination values page and size. Default value is 0, if value foe page parameter is provided. size is mandatory

response.name: fetches count of deals per movie based on city, language,name

item.name: Fetches the list of investments by investment status

request.description:
- Fetches the list of investments
    
- mandatory parameters: size - number of elements to be fetched per page
    
- optional parameters:
    
    - page - default is 0, if multiple pages exists, enter desired page number
        
    - status - default - fetches all investments irrespective of status
        
    - status types - ongoing,completed.
        
    - If any value for status is provided including null returns message "not a valid Investment Status" with HTTP status code 400 (bad request)
        
    - on success returns list of investments with HTTP status code 200

response.name: Fetches the list of investments by investment status

item.name: fetches the list of theatres in a city

request.description:
- fetches the list of theatres for a given city
    
- mandatory parameters:
    
    - city_id - id of the selected city
        
    - size - size of the elements to be returned in single page
        
- optioanl parameters:
    
    - page - default value - 0 , if multiple pages exists, enter desired page number

item.name: fetches list of deals for a theatre grouped my movie

request.description:
- fetches the list of deals in a theatre on given date grouped by movie
    
- mandatory parameters:
    
    - theatre_id - id of theatre for which deals are to be fetched
        
    - size - specifies the number of elements to be returned in a single page
        
    - date - retrieves deals on a given date
        
- optional parameters:
    
    - page - default value - 0. or specify the page number to retrieve specific page deals
        
- returns empty list if no deals are found
    
- returns list of deals grouped by movie in a specific theatre with HTTP status code 200.

response.name: fetches list of deals for a theatre on a given date grouped my movie

item.name: create a user profile

request.description:
- creates a user profile with given details
    
- while creating user profile if provided email or pan number or mobile number already exists, an exception is thrown with HTTP status code "422" with message "user already exists with given mobile number or email or pan number"
    
- on success returns HTTP status code 200 along with created user profile

response.name: create a user profile

item.name: Get existing user profile based on mobile number

response.name: Get existing user profile based on mobile number

item.name: Verify and add bank account details for given mobile number

request.description:
- Verifies the provided bank details and saves the details and adds it to user profile
    
- Mandatory parameters: mobileno
    
- If user profile doesnt exists with given mobile number throws UserNotFoundException with HTTP status code "404" along with message "User with given mobile number doesn't exists"
    
- If the provided kyc details are invalid throws InvalidBankDetailsException with HTTP status error code "400" along with message "verification failed with given bank account details"
    
- If verification is successful, kyc details are saved and added to user profile with given mobile number and updates "bank_details_verified" attribute of user profile to true. Returns HTTP status code 200

response.name: Verify and add bank account details for given mobile number

item.name: verify kyc details and add to user profile

request.description:
- Verifies the kyc details and adds it to user profile
    
- Mandatory parameters: mobileno
    
- If user profile doesnt exists with given mobile number throws UserNotFoundException with HTTP status code "404" along with message "User with given mobile number doesn't exists"
    
- If the provided kyc details are invalid throws InvalidKycDetailsException with HTTP status error code "400" along with message "verification failed with given kyc details"
    
- If verification is successful, kyc details are saved and added to user profile with given mobile number and updates "aadhar_verified" attribute of user profile to true. Returns HTTP status code 200

response.name: verify kyc details and add to suer profile

item.name: Updating a user profile

request.description:
- Updates user profile with given mobile number
    
- Throws usernotfoundexception if user profile doesn't exists with given mobile number and returns 404 HTTP status code
    
- returns Http Status code 200 if update is successful with message "user profile updated successfully"
    
- while updating user if provided email or pan number already exists, an exception is thrown with HTTP status code "422" with message "user already exists with given email or pan number"
    
- Mandatory Request parameters: mobileNo

response.name: Updating a user profile
